keel.Algorithms.Hyperrectangles.EACH

Class HyperrectangleSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Hyperrectangles.EACH.HyperrectangleSet

  • public class HyperrectangleSet
extends java.lang.Object

    Structure to store a set of hyperrectangle.

    Since:
    JDK1.2

    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Written by Rosa Venzala (University of Granada) 02/06/2008, Modified by Xavi Solé (La Salle, Ramón Llull University - Barcelona) 16/12/2008

    • Constructor Detail

      • HyperrectangleSet

        public HyperrectangleSet(Hyperrectangle[] setv,
                         int atributos,
                         int ndatos,
                         int utiles,
                         double delta)

        Constructor

        Parameters:
        setv - a vector that contains the hyperrectangles
        atributos - the number of attributes of the set of data
        ndatos - the number of data of train set
        utiles - the actual number of hyperrectangles
        delta - parameter to adjust the weight of the attributes
